wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Frederik Smith (born 21 May 1996) is an English cricketer who played for Glamorgan. Primarily a right-handed batsman, he also bowls right-arm off break. He made his Twenty20 debut for the Marylebone Cricket Club in the 2018 MCC Tri-Nation Series against Nepal on 29 July 2018.
